title: Does This Photo Show ‘Skinhead Cop with a Right-Wing Militia Tattoo’ Arresting a Jewish Protester?
subtitle: Concerned social media users homed in on a controversial tattoo worn by an Elizabeth, New Jersey, police officer at a June 2019 protest.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A photograph shared on social media in mid-2019 shows a "skinhead" police officer with a "right-wing militia" tattoo.
